Servo¶

Set Angle¶

set_angle(self, angle)

angle must be between 0 and 255

Sets the servo to be positioned at the desired angle
Robo.Motor1.set_angle(90)

Check Servo Action¶

check_action(self)

Returns 1 if the action is completed
while not Robo.Servo1.check_action():
        # do stuff
